channel.title: Keep freezing
channel.description:
i was wondering if someone can help me im running 525 and i keep getting this error
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\InsidiaX.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.jav a:146) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.jav a:101) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115) at client.startUp(client.java:9163) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744) Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at WorldController.method279(WorldController.java:134 ) at ObjectManager.method171(ObjectManager.java:210) at client.method22(client.java:1163) at client.method54(client.java:3934) at client.loadingStages(client.java:3893) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:4404) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:3492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:6165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)

item.title: Keep freezing
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Ha, I see, Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space. Allocate more RAM (assuming you can), read this.

Read full topic

item.title: Keep freezing
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

The file C:\InsidiaX.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt isn’t found, make sure the cache is being unzipped properly.

Read full topic
